europeana:record.dc:title: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 8. The types of Turdinus kalulongae Sharpe, 1893, a synonym of Malacopteron magnirostre cinereocapillum (Salvadori, 1868)
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Dickinson E.C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Aves
Turdinus kalulongae
types
lectotype
ICZN
europeana:record.dc:description: Two types of Turdinus kalulongae Sharpe, 1893, exist. The specimen at Tring is a lectotype, not a holotype as listed. The designation was indirect but consistent with the Rules of the International Code of Zoological Nomenclature. The case well illustrates the preciseness of the applicability of the Rules in action.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 8. The types of Turdinus kalulongae Sharpe, 1893, a synonym of Malacopteron magnirostre cinereocapillum (Salvadori, 1868) (Volume 331)
